Name: Project:Dream
About the game: Description: 'Project: Dream' A Side-Scrolling fighting game set within the future. Fight your way through a small, yet growing, roster of hero's and defeat your opponents! Take on strong fighters or defeat your friends in local multiplayer to prove your skill amongst the competition. (This an indie portfolio piece. The game is still being developed overtime and is primarily to showcase my 3D work. New features and updates will come with time!) Key Features: - Local Multiplayer - Varying difficulty of CPU fighters - A growing cast of fighters - Toon shaded art style - Multiple levels to select from
Meta Title: Project:Dream: Oct 12, 2022, Mark Peterson and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Project:Dream? Check out the release date (Oct 12, 2022), developer insights from Mark Peterson, and a complete game summary.
